citation: Proclamation under the Australian Crime Commission (Tasmania) Act 2004 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Australian Crime Commission (Tasmania) Act 2004

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Australian Crime Commission (Tasmania) Act 2004 fix 1 November 2004 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

11 October 2004

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Police and Public Safety

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 20 October 2004

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Police and Public Safety.
